Verses: 1 en Ratchippin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Iravum Pagalum Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren.
2 en Vinnappam Umadhu Samugaththil Varuvathaaga; En Kooppiduthalukku Umadhu Seviyaich Saaiththarulum.
3 en Aaththumaa Dhukkaththaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; En Jeevan Paathaalaththirkuch Sameebamaai Vandhirukkiradhu.
4 naan Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalodu Ennappattu, Belanatra Manushanaip Polaanen.
5 mariththavargalil Oruvanaippol Negizhappattirukkiren; Neer Ini Orupodhum Ninaiyaathapadi, Umadhu Kaiyaal Aruppundupoip Piredhakkuzhigalile Kidakkiravargalaip Polaanen.
7 ummudaiya Kobam Ennai Iruththugiradhu; Ummudaiya Alaigal Ellaavatrinaalum Ennai Varuththappaduththugireer. (selaa.)
8 enakku Arimugamaanavargalai Enakkuth Dhooramaaga Vilakki, Avargalukku Ennai Aruvaruppaakkineer; Naan Veliye Purappadakkoodaathapadi Adaipattirukkiren.
9 dhukkaththinaal En Kan Thoindhupoyitru; Karththaave, Anudhinamum Naan Ummai Nokkik Kooppittu, Umakku Neraaga En Kaigalai Virikkiren.
10 mariththavargalukku Adhisayangalaich Seyveero? Seththuppona Veerar Ezhundhu Ummaith Thudhippaargalo? (selaa.)
11 piredhakkuzhiyil Umadhu Kirubaiyum, Azhivil Umadhu Unmaiyum Vivarikkappadumo?
12 irulil Umadhu Adhisayangalum, Maradhiyin Boomiyil Umadhu Needhiyum Ariyappadumo?
13 naano Karththaave, Ummai Nokkik Kooppidugiren; Kaalaiyile En Vinnappam Umakkumunbaaga Varum.
14 karththaave, En En Aaththumaavaith Thallividugireer? En Umadhu Mugaththai Enakku Maraikkireer?
15 siruvayadhumudhal Naan Sirumaippattavanum Maandupogiravanumaayirukkiren; Ummaal Varum Thigilgal Enmel Sumandhirukkiradhu, Naan Manankalangugiren.
16 ummudaiya Erichchalgal Enmel Purandupogiradhu; Ummudaiya Payangarangal Ennai Adhampannugiradhu.
17 avaigal Naadorum Thanneeraippol Ennaich Soozhndhu, Egamaai Ennai Valaindhukollugiradhu.
18 sinegidhanaiyum Thozhanaiyum Enakkuth Dhooramaaga Vilakkineer; Enakku Arimugamaanavargal Maraindhuponaargal.
